title.bibl: Loxias, Feb. 7, 1917. Dance for the Funds of the School

div.bibl: Loxias, Feb. 7, 1917. DANCE FOR THE FUNDS OF THE SCHOOL

body.p: p. 2- Because of need of money for the school fund the Greek-American school "Koraes" will give a dance on February 15th at 7:30 P.M. in the Casino Hall, White City.
The program is composed of two parts. The first part includes twenty-nine songs, poems, recitations, and dialogues, and the second part is the dance. Admission is fifty cents.
All parishioners of the school and the church are invited to attend so that the needed money may be raised.
